scripts.reinstall: npm run unlink && npm run link
scripts.ci:backend: cd backend && yarn lint && npx tsc --noEmit && yarn test
scripts.ci:frontend: cd frontend && yarn lint && npx tsc --noEmit && yarn test && yarn build
scripts.ci:all: npm run ci:backend && npm run ci:frontend
scripts.ci:frontend:build: cd frontend && NODE_ENV=production NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 yarn build
